end

public void end()
Finalizes the image creation and closes the file stream. This MUST be called after writing the lines.

prepare

public void prepare(PngReader reader)
To be called after setting parameters and before writing lines. If not called explicityly will be called implicitly.

Parameters:
reader - Optional. If not null, pallette and some ancillary chunks will be copied. TODO: mejorar tratamiento de chunks, como palette. http://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#table53

setCompLevel

public void setCompLevel(int compLevel)
compression level: between 0 and 9 (default:6)

setDpi

public void setDpi(java.lang.Double dpi)
Set physical resolution, in DPI (dots per inch) optional, only informative

setFilterType

public void setFilterType(int filterType)
Sets filter type: the recommend is the default FILTER_PAETH If the filter is not implemented an excpetion will be thrown when writing the image. Can be changed for each line.

setOverrideFile

public void setOverrideFile(boolean overrideFile)
if this is set, the file will be overwritten, if not an exception will be thrown

writeRow

public void writeRow(ImageLine imgline)
this uses the row number from the imageline!

writeRow

public void writeRow(int[] newrow,
                     int n)
Writes a full image row. This must be called sequentially from n=0 to n=rows-1 One integer per sample , in the natural order: R G B R G B ... (or R G B A R G B A... if has alpha) The values should be between 0 and 255 for 8 bitspc images, and between 0- 65535 form 16 bitspc images (this applies also to the alpha channel if present) The array can be reused.

Parameters:
newrow - Array of pixel values
n - Number of row, from 0 (top) to rows-1 (bottom)
